description: Main source file for a Flutter application implementing a cinematic TV interface with focus navigation, animated background, hero banner, recommendations carousel, and various UI components.

classes.name: HomeData
classes.description: Data model representing homepage JSON data, including title, tags, synopsis, hero poster URL, and recommendations.

classes.name: Recommendation
classes.description: Model representing individual recommended items with id, title, and poster URL.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying the home screen with hero banner, recommendations, and animated background.

classes.name: _HeroBanner
classes.description: Stateful widget displaying the hero poster with blurred backdrop, parallax effect, overlay content, and focus handling.

classes.name: ShaderMask
classes.description: Widget applying edge fading effect to the recommendations list.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, calls runApp with the root widget.

methods.name: _loadHome
methods.description: Asynchronously loads JSON data from assets and updates state.

methods.name: _handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles focus navigation in specific directions based on D-pad input.
